BlogEntry.Title: Joe Bork
BlogEntry.Description:
Ha!  Joe Bork linked to me just to let you know that we are not the same person :)

I would have made it to that crossroads thing but I'm stuck here in steamy Boise.

BlogEntry.Title: L.A. with pickup trucks
BlogEntry.Description: Ug!  The outside air temp (as reported by my car -- not known for its acuracy) registred as 104F.  Now I remember why I like Seattle.
